item.description: Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Members We meet at different locations during the year.In the winter we will be meeting at The Freetown State Forest,in the spring at the Westport town beach,in the summer at Seapowet Beach in Tiverton and in the fall we will be back at the Westport town beach! Linda and Bob 20 Truman St Westport,Ma Ps-You will get an email about location of this meetup!
item.how_to_find_us: Parkinglot to the left of the rangers station!

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group
